casebody.data:
In the Matter of JAN W. PARIS, Inc., Bankrupt. Bernard G. Heyn, Respondent-Appellant, Irving Trust Company, Trustee-Appellee. No. 435. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 20, 1935. Hammond & Littell, of New York City (Nelson Littell, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Krause, Hirsch & Levin, of New York City (George C. Levin, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order (-F.Supp. —) affirmed.
